meanings.sent1: I love to snack on colbies with crackers.

meanings.definition: To gather or collect in a haphazard manner.
meanings.sent1: She colbies all her art supplies in one messy drawer.
meanings.sent2: The kids colbies seashells along the shore during their beach trip.
meanings.sent3: He always colbies his thoughts before speaking, leading to confusion.
meanings.sent4: The wind colbies fallen leaves into colorful piles on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The team quickly colbies their gear before heading to the game.
